embed.description: The Heart of the Storm is the final boss fight, given that the player has all 3 **Challenge Bells* and collected both **Lumin Goop** and **Broken Vase**, combining them to form **The Lumin Vase**.

fields.name: Mechanics
fields.value: The Heart of the Storm fight starts with 6 enemies and has no additional waves. The order of these enemies is always the same, up to swapping the rows. This order is **Frost Jailer**, **Frost Lancer**, **Frost Junker**, and **Frost Crusher**, **Frost Bomber**, **Frost Muncher**. The mechanic unique to this fight is the Unmovable debuff, which is added to player cards on the board while **Frost Jailer** is alive.

fields.name: Row A
fields.value:
**Frost Jailer** - <&Health&> 90, <&Attack&> 5, <&Counter&> 5, While active, add **Unmovable** to all enemies.
**Frost Lancer** - <&Health&> 60, <&Attack&> 7, <&Counter&> 6, <&ResistSnow&>, **Aimless**.
**Frost Junker** - <&Health&> 30, <&Attack&> 1, <&Counter&> 2, When a card is destroyed, gain +1 <&Attack&>.

fields.name: Row B
fields.value:
**Frost Crusher** - <&Health&> 90, <&Attack&> 2, <&Counter&> 2, Gain +2 <&Attack&>.
**Frost Bomber** - <&Health&> 60, <&Attack&> 5, <&Counter&> 4, <&ResistSnow&>, **Barrage**.
**Frost Muncher** - <&Health&> 30, <&Attack&> 4, <&Counter&> 6, Destroy the rightmost card in your hand.
